desc.cn: 由 Yubico 开发的工具，用于配置和管理 YubiKey 设备。它提供了一个界面来更改 YubiKey 上的设置，包括 PIN 管理、FIDO2、OTP 和 PIV 功能。此工具支持多种操作系统，使用户能够自定义 YubiKey 的安全功能，以满足特定的安全需求。
desc.en: A tool developed by Yubico for configuring and managing YubiKey devices. It provides an interface for changing settings on the YubiKey, including PIN management, FIDO2, OTP, and PIV functionality. This tool supports multiple operating systems, allowing users to customize the security features of the YubiKey to meet specific security needs.
